title: Advertising banner: promotion of a drugstore
content:
Hi, I'm developing a demo of a website to a pharmacy. And I need to know what font is this or similar to give the demo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133828im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sin-t%C3%ADtulo-3_6349.png)

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133828/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Sin-título-6.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133828/http:/typophile.com/files/Sin-t%C3%ADtulo-6.png) | 140.43 KB |
author: Oso pardo

comments.content:
"PREMIO CUIDARTE" looks like **Alianza Italic (900)** by Manuel Corradine - Sergio Ramirez [Corradine Fonts, 2013]:  
 [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/alianza/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317133828/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/alianza/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/alianza/")
thank you very much! Your answer has been very useful to me
